services.title: ARCHITECTURE
services.description: Our full-service Architectural Design Team specialized providing high quality design service to our diverse client group. We have time for each project. From inception to occupancy, we think thoroughly through every detail of our projects in our continual quest to provide the best design solutions.

services.title: Community Planing / Urban Design
services.description: The formation of 'The Community' is one of our greatest assets. The Community provides the platform to investigate and navigate common grounds to promote equity and opportunity. It thus, reflects the best of what is attainable within our commonwealth. At Cinctamore, we work constantly to improve communities to sustain them for better futures.

services.title: Engineering and Construction
services.description: We do not cut corners. We are committed to helping our clients with the most appropriate construction solutions to their designs. In other words, we help our clients build, repair and avoid problems when it comes to buildings. Through our holistic, honest and careful attention to detail approach to construction, we do what is right to satisfy our clients and to return best value for their investment.

services.title: Robotics and Digital Fabrication
services.description: Some designs are simply challenging to develop with conventional fabrication techniques. On the other hand, we do not want fabrication to pose undesired challenges to the design goals of clients. At Cinctamore, enjoy research through making, hence, we continually seeking avenues that critically engage and explore the capacity of the tools at our disposal to create high quality and consistent products.

services.title: Branding and High impact Printing Solutions
services.description: The best Design Solution goes hand-in-hand with appropriate Engineering Solution. We evaluate and structure our projects thoroughly to ensure that the solutions we offer meet the unique project requirements, goals, and challenges.

services.title: Architectural Tours
services.description: Ghana has a rich Architectural Heritage. Whichever way that you choose to explore our country through our distinct walking tours, visits to one of the city's old and emerging neighborhoods, secondary school tour (in Accra and beyond) or join our sensational oceanfront boat rides, our expert docents will guide you and share the stories behind the buildings, structure and morphology of our communities.
